pkgmetadata.longdescription: The tree sequence toolkit.Tskit is a cross-platform library for the storage and analysis of large-scalegenetic genealogy and variation data.Please see the `documentation <https://tskit.dev/tskit/docs/stable/>`_for further details.Tskit is highly portable, and provides a number of`installation options <https://tskit.dev/tskit/docs/stable/installation.html>`_.
